messages.subject: Re:Still need Help! Barbara Sher project
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 9/12/2003 12:14:21 AM Eastern Standard Time, ... She needs anything you can offer her. I thought the tip thing was confusing, so I gave an
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 9/12/2003 12:14:21 AM Eastern Standard Time,
UnschoolingDiscussion@yahoogroups.com writes:

> I wasn't able to read the book online at the URL you posted and I've
> never seen the book. Does she want something in the "TIP" format
> below? Or just little stories? I can come up with something, I'm
> sure, but I just don't know how to write it.
>
> Holly
>
>

She needs anything you can offer her. I thought the tip thing was confusing,
so I gave an example of that.

Send me your stuff! I'm only about a fifth of the way there!

Kathryn, who is tired, crampy, fighting with her kid's father, cranky, and
still really excited about this conference


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
